This add on adds support for the Spine animation library

Installation
============

1. Download and install the fungus.unitypackage in your Unity project
http://fungusgames.com

2. Download and install the Spine runtime unitypackage in your Unity project
http://esotericsoftware.com/files/runtimes/unity/spine-unity.unitypackage

3. Install the Fungus-Spine unitypackage
